member.name: OFSTRUCT
member.summary: Contains information about a file that the function opened or attempted to open.

member.name: OFSTRUCT.cBytes
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: OFSTRUCT.fFixedDisk
member.summary: If this member is nonzero, the file is on a hard (fixed) disk. Otherwise, it is not.

member.name: OFSTRUCT.nErrCode
member.summary: The MS-DOS error code if the function failed.

member.name: OFSTRUCT.szPathName
member.summary: The path and file name of the file.
